subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Missouri’s Laurence Bowers scored 19 points and grabbed 10 rebounds as the Tigers beat Stanford, 78-70, in the first round of the Battle 4 Atlantis on Thursday.
snippet: Missouri’s Laurence Bowers scored 19 points and grabbed 10 rebounds as the Tigers beat Stanford, 78-70, in the first round of the Battle 4 Atlantis on Thursday.
